name: 100th Anniversary of Albert Bonniers Förlag
obverse: Busts of Albert Bonnier and Karl Otto Bonnier facing left.
reverse: Busts of Gerhard Bonnier, Adolf Bonnier, David Felix Bonnier facing in various ways.
reverse_inscriptions: GERHARD BONNIER * 1778 + 1862 · ADOLF BONNIER * 1806 + 1867 · DAVID FELIX BONNIER * 1822 + 1881 ·
description: This medal was made to the 100th Anniversary of Albert Bonniers Förlag a Swedish publishing company founded in 1837.
